wordGroup: happy everyday 快乐每一天（祝福语）
articles of everyday use 日常用品

sentences.en: The Internet has become part of everyday life.
sentences.cn: 互联网已成为日常生活的一部分。

sentences.en: Complaints seemed to be an everyday occurrence.
sentences.cn: 投诉似乎成了天天发生的事。

sentences.en: Her novels are anchored in everyday experience.
sentences.cn: 她的小说取材自日常生活经验。
